title: Lime and cranberry bread and butter pudding
description: This zesty take on bread and butter pudding makes a tasty alternative to Christmas pudding.
ingredients: 40g/1½oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
8 tbsp ready-made redcurrant jelly, for glazing
200ml/7fl oz double cream, whipped until stiff peaks form when the whisk is removed, to serve
